markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Magic Warrior Aspect](/Feats.aspx?ID=904) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 95 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Magic Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=19)

**Prerequisites**
[Magic Warrior Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=903)

</column>

---

You can alter your form to gain an aspect of the animal your mask represents. You gain the [_magic warrior aspect_](/Spells.aspx?ID=547) focus spell.
name: Magic Warrior Aspect
